text: Fry's Food and Drug is an American Kroger-owned supermarket chain. It was founded in 1954 in California by American businessman Donald Fry. In 1972, Fry's was purchased by Kansan grocery store chain Dillons, which was then purchased by Kroger in 1983.Kroger-Dillon merger approved It mainly serves Arizona, with 123 locations statewide.Google Map of Fry's Food and Pharmacy locations It currently has 22,000 employees. == References == Category:Supermarkets of the United States
title: Fry's Food and Drug
